entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher.Tests failed for File_Create_Tests, Directory_Move_Tests, and Directory_NotifyFilter_Tests #104269
  • UnsafeAccessor throws MissingFieldException on generic types #104268
  • ILLink should build type info after custom steps run for a type #104266
    9.0.0
  • Failed test: JIT/SIMD/LdfldGeneric_ro/LdfldGeneric_ro (arm64) #104263
  • [API Proposal]: LdapSessionOptions.CaCertificates Property #104260
  • Dump file not created when process crashes #104256
  • Dotnet Android broken debugging (and runtime?) #104265
  • Stack allocated boxes end up address exposed #104250
  • MethodTable::IsClassInited returns false for <PrivateImplementationDetails> class #104247
  • DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED when trying to debug .NET 8 Blazor Web project simulating iOS device on edge #104234
  • Potential improvements for System.Numerics.Complex #104233
  • Matrix4x4IndexerGetTest and Matrix4x4IndexerSetTest failing on native AOT arm64 #104232
  • JsonPolymorphicAttribute.IgnoreUnrecognizedTypeDiscriminators doesn't handle "no discriminator" use case #104228
    Future
  • Assertion failed under System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CheckDefaultProvider #104221
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Tests.GCTests.KeepAlive_Null #104218
  • System.Resources.Extensions.Tests resource re-generation is broken after BinaryFormatter extrication #104216

Closed

  • System.FieldAccessException: Cannot set initonly static field #104242
  • Runtime tests fail to AOT compile on Apple mobile platforms #103982
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/CriticalHandles/ReverseTest/ReverseTest/ReverseTest.cmd #94392
  • Test failure: GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\gettotalmemory\\gettotalmemory.cmd #100053
  • .NET web site is down #104230
  • [7.0] Wasm-tools fails to build because it calls GetTempFileName and runs out of temporary files #95933
  • event handle leak issue of using ConcurrentDictionary in .net8.0 in win10 #102969
  • Use `SearchValues<string>` in Regex #85693
    9.0.0
  • .NET 6 Application fails after windows updates with Hostpolicy.dll missing #101231
  • System.Numerics.Tests.op_rightshiftTest.LargeNegativeBigIntegerShiftTest #102087
  • Access to the path 'c:\temp\filename' is denied #98796
  • [API Proposal]: GC.WaitForPendingFinalizersAsync #104101
  • JIT: Support object stack allocation #11192
    Future
  • Add support for `ISpanFormattable` in `StringBuilder.Append(Object)` #92193
  • High probability of loading an Assembly with no Image #100435
    Future
  • At least packages.microsoft.com has 8.0.7 version #104145
  • Numerical issue when multiply 1.001 by 1000 #104225
  • [release/6.0-staging] Ensure the single-job-per-target-based official build produces all the correct assets #103485
    6.0.x
  • Improve static library publishing #70277
    Future
  • Suboptimal code generated for even a trivial ValueConverter #85570
    9.0.0
  • Jit should avoid allocations for T1 is T2 pattern in generics #58554
    Future
  • Undoing boxing doesn't work with C# 7 pattern matching #10195
    Future
  • JIT: optimizations for multi-use boxes #9118
    Future
  • CLR/JIT should optimize "alloc temporary small object" to "alloc on stack" automatically #4584
    Future
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Refactor GlobalizationNative_IndexOfNative function #87767
    Future
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization code refactoring #94162
    9.0.0
  • Is it safe to do this volatile++ operation in WebSocketBuffer? #103907
  • [wasm] EmccCompile, and MonoAOTCompiler should explicitly use `IBuildEngine9.ReleaseCores` #95431
    9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization throwing exception culture identifier not found when creating culture #95195
    9.0.0
  • Consider to enable FEATURE_MULTICASTSTUB_AS_IL for Windows x86 #103958
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert ILLink's usage of dependency analysis framework #104267
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Don't contain the address for Vector_GetElement on Arm64 #104264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use double.Hypot in Complex #104262
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use Math.sinh and Math.cosh in Complex #104261
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToDouble` #104259
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `AddRotateAcross` and `AddSequentialAcross` #104258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Start Loader contract and implement ISOSDacInterface::GetModuleData in cDAC #104257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Attempt at improving `JsonNode.DeepEquals` numeric equality. #104255
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Detect class inited status more correctly in prestub/jitinterface #104253
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make randomized string equality comparers implement IAlternateEqualityComparer #104252
    area-System.Collections
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] drop old npm dependencies #104249
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.8
  • Arm64/Sve: Rewrite how ConditionalSelect wraps the embedded mask operations #104248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Generate forwarder if all parameters can't be marshaled in LibraryImport #104246
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default implementation of strength reduction #104243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix potential Debug.Assert in QuicListener #104241
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `Assembly.GetCallingAssembly` for native AOT #104229
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Remove PreviewFeature #104227
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • Adding support for morphing associative hwintrinsics #104224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize multicast delegate thunk #104222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify Emit SignatureHelper WriteSimpleSignature #104220
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Update mono-interp to handle the same Vector.As APIs as mono-jit #104217
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Use resumable leaf frames in CET hijack and in GC stress. #104198
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix static-lib AOT Mono builds #103988
    area-Build-mono
  • Block failing Matrix4x4 tests on activeissue #104235
    area-System.Numerics
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in ComInterfaceInfo.OptionsAreValid #102384
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify JsonSerializer.GetMetadataPropertyName #104244
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Simplify SoundPlayer.ValidateSoundData #104239
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Simplify AltSvcHeaderParser.TryReadPercentEncodedAlpnProtocolName #104240
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Ensure rented array is always returned in `Measurement` #104223
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Make consistent HybridGlobalization checks #104082
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Improve perf of JsonValue.CreateFromElement by calling ValueKind once #104108
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Added `ReleaseCores` to `BuildEngine` usages that did not have it. #104141
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ios][HybridGlobalization] Fix default culture #104071
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Enable FEATURE_MULTICASTSTUB_AS_IL for Windows x86 #104192
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use RtlDllShutdownInProgress to detect process shutdown on Windows #103877
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Added four SVE `CreateBreak*` APIs #104184
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64-mono] Part-1:Add native code emission module for LoongArch64 #103403
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64. #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2486333 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Poly fill Index and Range types #104170
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement `IAlternateEqualityComparer<ReadOnlySpan<char>, string>` on `EqualityComparer<string>.Default` #104202
    area-System.Collections
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Xml serializer test updates prep for reflection work #104173
    area-Serialization
  • Optimize VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Unify LSRA call arg building #104051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use bitshift instead of multiply in Unsafe.Add intrinsic if possible #103775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clean up JSON property lookup logic and add alternate key lookup support. #103836
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128<long> multiplication for arm64 #104177
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: don't reorder blocks early #104213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Normalize the creation of simd comparison nodes and give basic constant folding support #104215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have morph normalize patterns to GT_NEG and GT_NOT #104214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_de… #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [H/3] Wait for `WritesClosed` and `Dispose` as fire-and-forget #104035
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [draft] testing memory stats of FF in helix #104152
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, 9.0.0
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, os-linux, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Part-2:Add runtime assembly code (*.S) files in nativeaot. #104084
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Ensure mini-amd64 correctly handles CMP_GT and CMP_GE for OP_XCOMPARE_FP #104206
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing DotNet CLI via winget not working - Dotnet CLI missing #41878

Closed

  • dotnet download page unavailable #41875
  • msbuild can not generate Publish.html file #41881
  • Change wwwroot to Assets in Razor Class Library #41818
  • Portable RID PublishAOT doesn't work from source-build VMR .NET 9 Preview 5 #41727

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix 15 packages to track their own versions through darc #41890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2486379 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use CPM in Binary Tool #41884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Update .gdnbaselines to address CredScan findings #41882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Support for Android Fast Deployment Telemetry [WIP] #41880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add feature switch for StackTraceSupport #41873

Merged

  • Reenable passed tests with skip attribute set as string #41753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS to include ClickOnce contributors #41883
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Prefer the portable ILCompiler when publishing for the portable RID on a source-built SDK. #41754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Update ILLink team name #41734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41695
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #41694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust SB license and content test triggers #41831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Obtain internal runtime SAS tokens via federated creds #41797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set CI Job timeouts #41733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview6] Allow runtime binary into the VMR #41839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41716
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

  • Start proposal for more constant types #8257
  • Object initializer updates #8253

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suppress No Longer Showing in Error List #74228
    Backlog
  • Partial properties needs to enforce that all implementation part accessors have bodies #74221
    17.12
  • Go To Definition on external package only works as expected the very first time #74220
  • IDE0059 is not raised inside a code block with using keyword. #74219
    Backlog

Closed

  • "Use collection expression" code fix drops comments in certain cases #73740
    Backlog
  • CS0266 suggests invalid code fix #56141
    Backlog
  • IDE0161 - Convert to file-scoped namespace reported on files with global namespace type declarations #74214
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Set intermediate path sooner #74229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Dispose various locations using PEReader #74226
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report a diagnostic on missing body in partial property implementation #74224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Syntax formatting options #74223
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallback options for SimplifierOptions #74222
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Preserve trivia for 'Use Collection Expression' fixer in more cases #74052
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with 'use explicit cast' and compound assignments #74225
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add analyzer/fixer to move people over to System.Threading.Lock #74170
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Escaping also considers record structs #74125
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • MetadataAsSource options #74212
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer 'convert' namespace when the ns has sibling types #74216
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74211
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge 'main' into features/FirstClassSpan #74203
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Add tests for consuming instance extension methods from VB and previous version of C# compiler. #74182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 13 #74215
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Search fewer projects when looking for linked documents #73939
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Display lifted primary constructor parameters in watch window … #74188
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Ensure that when EnC finishes that it disposes the OOP connection it is holding onto #73465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make project system workspace transformation functions resilient to being attempted twice #74189
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Broken localization after "Publish" from resources from the "Shared" library in the Blazor WASM client #56560
  • Consider replacing AddRouting with AddRoutingCore in AddConnections #56559
  • Issue restoring the project: Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk not found #56556
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56554
  • Quarantine RazorViews_AreUpdatedOnChange and RazorPages_AreUpdatedOnChange #56553
  • Change wwwroot to Assets in Razor Class Library #56552
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Internal.Http.HttpResponseHeaders` does not validate headers the same way as `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HeaderDictionary` does #56543
  • Blazor static SSR SupplyParameterFromForm has issue to bind a Dictionary value which is declared after a nullable property. #56542
  • Schema get duplicated for every request in open-api #56541
  • User is authenticated false, when using multiple cookie authentications #56540
  • `DatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter` produces bizzare exception if model fails to initialize #56539
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #56538
  • Blazor WebAssembly Error: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'out') after Publishing #56537

Closed

  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #56555
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #56520
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56479
  • RemoteAuthenticatorView is failing when CustomAuthenticationStateProvider is registered for keycloak #56508
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56536

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Allow streams to get disposed while being transmitted to the browser #56557
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56547
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24351.1 #56546
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `34ad51b` #56545
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix comment typos in build props #56544
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Annotate SignalR server for native AOT #56460
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview7
  • Increase the default number of IO queues on larger machines #56501
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Simply SignalR Client IAsyncEnumerable usage #56561
    area-signalr
  • Set readOnly status for properties and support OpenApiServers #56470
    area-mvc
  • Always ref request body and response schemas and fix nested types #56513
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add logging to MVC tests #55592
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Use UtcNowParameterKey constant to replace usages of "UtcNow" in DatabaseOperations.cs #56442
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Avoid StringSegment conversions #56533
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use pattern matching #56532
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use char overloads to Join/Index strings #56531
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix typos #56530
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Amortise HTTP Result Content-Type arrays #56525
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Replace "instanceof" due to DOM realm mixin when Blazor is IFRAME-d #56367
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01

Updated

    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • error XAPRAS7023: System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path \AndroidLib1\bin\Debug\net8.0-android\android-x64\AndroidLib1.dll #23382

  • [MAUI]I9_ Scrolling-Clicking the 'Scroll to third cat' button does not respond #23379
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I8_headers and footers_DataTemplate header and footer for Vertical list page no header and footer #23378
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I2_Spacing - The horizontal spacing should be changed but it is actually changed vertically #23377
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I9_Srolling_Snap points_ SnapPointsAlignment set to any value and the Items no change in position #23376
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]I1_Layout Horizontal grid for Text page is truncated #23375
    Backlog
  • A sample app stops working after the 1st run #23374
  • [MAUI]I3_Sizing & I6_Grouping-Variable size items for vertical list throw exception after scrolling #23373
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - Multiple selection failed on MacCatalyst Platform #23372
    Backlog
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReached on CollectionView is triggered infinitely when a ControlTemplate is set #23370
  • Assets file '... QueryEngine\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net7.0'. #23368
  • Picker regression in 8.0.60 #23367
    .NET 8 SR7

Closed

  • Memory leak in RadioButton ControlTemplate #23199
    Backlog
  • [Spec] Provide Nullable Safe getters on ViewHandler base class #916
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fixing regression in Picker behavior in 8.0.60 #23369
    community ✨

Merged

  • Enable RefreshView Tests #23181
    area-testing
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23328
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main into net9.0 #23384
  • Revert "[net9.0] Merge main into net9.0" #23383
  • [Windows] Make sure that `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` folder exists in unpackaged #23265
    area-essentials, community ✨

Updated

  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • Run UI tests per groups of categories in CI #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Crash upon resuming the app - fix #23360

    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • [Binding SG] Split bindings source generated code into multiple files #23116
    area-xaml
  • [Android] RequestLayout when visibility changes (#20264) #23365
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327

  • [Windows] `LabelHandler` - remove extra (?) line #23346
    community ✨
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350

  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entities are not being tracked #34130

Closed

  • Cosmos: add support for pagination #24513
    9.0.0
  • Migrations Script creation not working #34134
  • Unable to cascade delete when circular dependency is in context #34076
  • CosmosDB: ChangeTracker does not allow 2 entities with same ID but different PartitionKey #33903
  • Is it possible to manually track new entity objects in a query expression? #33884
  • Add interceptors as generic types to the DbContext #33837
  • Query: investigate result discrepancy between sqlserver and sqlite for compex query with multiple nested subqueries and max #32559
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SqlServer DATEPART support for Microsecond and Nanosecond properties. #34135
  • Simplify AND and OR #34133

Merged

  • Use using for critical section management everywhere #34120
  • Implement Cosmos pagination #34103
  • Enable `Max_in_multi_level_nested_subquery` test on Sqlite #34128

Updated

  • Fix for #34117, Improve Hash Code Distribution for RelationalCommandCache Keys #34118
  • Enable testing of compiled models in CI and on SQLite #34111
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version to 4.10 #34116
  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048
  • Use null propagation to optimize away `IS NOT NULL` checks #34127
  • Simplify `COALESCE` based on the nullability of its arguments #33938
  • Use XOR to translate some == and != expressions #34124
  • Enable `Resolve_scoped_application_service` test #34129
